reputation: having frequent brawls
being a place to gamble
being a meeting place for organized crime
back alley dealings and illegal goods trade
it's dangerous clientele, including thieves, assassins and bandits
its connection to the criminal underworld
decor_description: low ceilings/vaulted ceilings
a waterside entrance
a roaring fireplace
a fighting pit
limited seating/extensive seating
a second floor balcony
a performance stage
murals painted on the walls and ceilings
worn tapestries hung on the walls
a flagstone floor/a brick floor/a hardwood floor
dim lighting/bright lighting
a help wanted board/bounty board
a [bone] skull mounted as a trophy above the fireplace
a variety of arms and armor displayed on the walls
no windows/small, barred windows/large bay windows/stained glass windows/large, arched windows
a collection of caricatures of local heroes, nobles and politicians
a stuffed [leather] on display in a corner
a statue of its namesake out front
many broken tables and chairs from a recent bar fight
a large, worn floor rug covering a locked trap door
an old, storied bar with a {weapon} prominently displayed behind the bartender

reputation: having frequent brawls
being a place to gamble
always having poets, story-tellers, bards or some other live entertainment
its patrons regularly belting out local drinking songs

their selection of drinks imported from several far away places
the cuisine prepared by its talented chef
the dedicated hookah area

decor: a painting of a [leather] on the wall
a small statue of a [bone] on a stand in the corner
a small bookshelf with a few well-worn books
a [clay] water jug on a shelf
eldritch runes carved into the floor
an old {armor.shield} hanging on the wall
a dull mirror on the back of the door
crystals on strings hanging from the rafters
gouges on the floor and walls from a struggle
bits of a broken {weapon} shoved under the bed/an old {weapon} hung on the wall/a damaged {weapon} left on a stand in a corner
an ornamental {armor.helmet} sitting on a display stand
a large maroon throw rug/a large navy throw rug/a large olive throw rug/a large tan throw rug/a large grey throw rug/a large orange throw rug/a large hunter green throw rug
